remarks: The converse isomorphism of an isomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dihcnvid1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihcnvid1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihcnvid1.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihcnvid1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( `' I ` ( I ` X ) ) = X ) $.
